title: [Rant]Cheating and Placements...My Experience
content: So I need to vent somewhere and I don't really have too many friends so here goes, Pesu placement cell and everyone in it are genuinely the most incompetent bunch of people I've ever had the displeasure to deal with on a daily basis, they don't even try to pretend anymore that they care about giving us a fair shot at the tests, I see people openly discussing in the assesment centre, pesu52,audi because there's only 2 constantly frustrated guys walking around fixing wifi issues monitoring us... What a joke. Now im grown up enough to understand our college management are far from saints but this is just atrocious. Complete and utter chaos and anarchy for everyone
